author: Jim Y
comment: For U.S. residents that are not military/fire/police or rescue 24hr mode is useless. The face is beautiful, but until 12hr mode is added this face is useless. Sorry.
title: No 12hr mode

author: Brian Cho
comment: 12PM is displayed as '00' please fix. Clean design. Would be nice if there would be an option to switch to an actual Ying-yang design watch face.
title: Needs options.

author: Peter Vu
comment: Would be nice to have the option to display 12 hour format... Update?
title: Nice watch face but...

author: Abdoulaye Adrien Diagne
comment: There is no 24h format and at noon its saying 00:00 instead of 12:00 this should be fixed at least
title: Very nice watchface but...

author: Steven Pilipow
comment: I really like it, but I wish it had options
title: Really nice
